steps.title: Nuclei Templates and Automation
steps.content: OBJECTIVE: Understand Nuclei templates. STEP-BY-STEP: 1. Learn templates. WHAT TO LOOK FOR: Template quality. COMMON PITFALLS: Over-engineering. This is a longer description to meet the test requirements for content length validation in the PT Journal tutorial system.

steps.title: AI-Powered Vulnerability Prioritization
steps.content: OBJECTIVE: Prioritize vulnerabilities. STEP-BY-STEP: 1. Use AI. WHAT TO LOOK FOR: Feature quality. COMMON PITFALLS: Overfitting. This is a longer description to meet the test requirements for content length validation in the PT Journal tutorial system.

steps.title: Automated Reconnaissance with AI

steps.title: AI-Driven Bug Hunting Workflows
steps.content: OBJECTIVE: Hunt bugs with AI. STEP-BY-STEP: 1. Implement workflows. WHAT TO LOOK FOR: Coordination. COMMON PITFALLS: Over-automation. This is a longer description to meet the test requirements for content length validation in the PT Journal tutorial system.
